name: Ensnaring Shadows
descrip: ¡Atrapan a tu enemigo con restricciones mágicas!Requiere que tu boca sea libre.
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] cantan y hace algunos movimientos arcanos antes de enviar cuerdas mágicas, vinculante [TargetYouOrMonsterName]!
statusMiss: [AttackerName] chants and makes a few arcane motions before sending out magical ropes, but [TargetName] easily evades them!
restraintStruggle: You struggle against the darkness bind your limbs...
restraintStruggleCharmed: You squirm against the darkness bind your limbs...
restraintEscaped: And finally break free, leaving the shadows dissapating into dissolving flecks in the air!
restraintEscapedFail: But can't break free of the tight shadowy embrace!
